blocks.TITLE: Introduction
blocks.SUBTITLE: Welcome to our privacy policy
blocks.DESC: We are committed to protecting your privacy.

blocks.TITLE: Data Collection
blocks.SUBTITLE: What data we collect
blocks.DESC: We collect personal information that you provide to us.

blocks.TITLE: How We Use Data
blocks.SUBTITLE: Ways we use your information
blocks.DESC: We use the information to provide better services.

blocks.TITLE: Your Rights
blocks.SUBTITLE: Your data protection rights
blocks.DESC: You have the right to request access to your personal data.
